title: reverted to S0
extract: to return to a former habit, practice, belief, condition, etc.: They reverted to the ways of their forefathers. Law . to go back to or return to the former owner or to his or her heirs. Biology . to return to an earlier or primitive type.
extract_html: to return to a former habit, practice, belief, condition, etc.: They reverted to the ways of their forefathers. Law . to go back to or return to the former owner or to his or her heirs. Biology . to return to an earlier or primitive type.
